descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71697-0-1448981984.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a female follower.
This is standalone. So you can use this with no problem whatever body types you're using.
 
 
[b][Follower detail][/b]
 
Name: Irina the Swift
Voice: Young Eager (Vanilla)
Body: CBBE or UNPB
Location: Angi's Camp
Combat Style: Archery
Perks: Overdraw, Critical Shot, Power Shot, Stealth, Light Foot, Face Light, Novice Alteration
ETC: Essential and marriable
 
 
[b][Recommended Mods][/b]
 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url] (I recommend an optional file too)
 
 
[b][Credit][/b]
 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit by tktk[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]
Girl of Innocence by Lumina
The Female Texture by Gonzo
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr. Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442]zzjay's wardrobe by zzjay[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013]Emfy Cleric Robes UNP - CBBE by Deserter X - Mitosuke[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55611]Gim Boots by Gimora[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57113]Amulets of Skyrim by uni_SL[/url]
 
Thank you for the mods.
 
 
[b][Change Log][/b]
 
v1.1 Adds the Irina's custom outfit.
 
v1.0a Fixs a bug.
 
 
[b][Video][/b]
 

[youtube]NhY-QGJ0wJs[/youtube]
by Vatiwah
 
Thank you for the video.
 
 
[b][My mods][/b]
